{{Infobox Berry |name = #08 Sitrus |image = [[File:Sitrus.png]] |caption = Sitrus came from the same family as [[Oran]]. It is larger and smoother tasting than Oran. |growtime = 10m |harvest = 9 berries |replant = 50% |points = 30 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *10 sweet *10 bitter *10 sour }} '''Sitrus''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]] to obtain [[Farming Points|Farm Points]]. It can be obtained as a random drop by defeating wild Pok√©mon on routes. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !!
